resource_notes: Security-sensitive task involving password hashing. Requires review by a senior developer or security champion.
alternative_approach: Assign to Senior developer for faster completion but at higher opportunity cost.
risk_factors: Incorrect implementation of bcrypt hashing can lead to security vulnerabilities.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory code review by Senior Backend Developer (backend.dev1@company.com).

task_name: Auth: Update JWT Strategy to Check Blocklist
resource_notes: Critical security task impacting every authenticated endpoint. Requires deep understanding of auth flow and potential performance impacts.
alternative_approach: None. Must be handled by a senior resource.
risk_factors: Introducing a synchronous network call (Redis) into the critical path of every request can degrade performance (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategy: Implement circuit breaker pattern and conduct targeted load testing on the middleware.

task_name: CI/CD: Implement GitHub Actions CD Workflow for EKS
resource_notes: Requires secure handling of AWS credentials in GitHub Actions and deep Kubernetes expertise.
alternative_approach: Use a managed deployment service, but at a higher cost.
risk_factors: Slow or flaky pipeline can reduce developer velocity (RISK-004). Limited capacity of DevOps Lead (50% allocation).
mitigation_strategy: Optimize pipeline for parallelism and caching. Allocate dedicated time for pipeline maintenance.

task_name: Jobs: Implement Scheduled Job for Final Data Purge
resource_notes: Compliance-critical task. Requires robust error handling and transactional integrity for distributed deletion.
alternative_approach: Manual deletion process, which is not scalable or compliant.
risk_factors: Risk of incomplete data purge across distributed systems (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Implement using a SAGA pattern with idempotent consumers and Dead-Letter Queues (DLQs) for failed events.
